content: विभावनं --ना {@--1@} Clear perception or ascertainment, discrimination, judgment. {@--2@} Discussion, investigation, examination. {@--3@} Conception, imagination. --ना (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech in which effects are represented as taking place though their usual causes are absent; क्रियायाः प्रतिषेधेपि फलव्यक्तिर्विभावना <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
